text:
BREAKING: In an incredible moment, President Trump gives HUGE praise to Elon Musk for helping North Carolina recover from the hurricane with Starlink
BREAKING: In an incredible moment, President Trump gives HUGE praise to Elon Musk for helping North Carolina recover from the hurricane with Starlink
"I said, 'Elon, we need 500 of those!' He said, 'You'll have them tomorrow.' I gotta give Elon Musk credit for that! He really saved a LOT of lives!"
